[DQR.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 03 - Dobit ili gubitak includes the concept ifrs-full:MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called hrvatskapostanska:ProfitOrLossTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ConsolidatedAndSeparateFinancialStatementsAxis. The statement presentation group 03 - Dobit ili gubitak includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table hrvatskapostanska:ProfitOrLossTable:
ifrs-full:MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense = 22,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table hrvatskapostanska:ProfitOrLossTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 3737

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 477,000 reported in the network role http://hrvatskapostanska.com/xbrl/2021/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 477,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://hrvatskapostanska.com/xbrl/2021/roles/IzvjesceOPromjenamaKapitala. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : HRK Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900D5G4V6THXC5P79/2021-12-31/ESEF/HR/0/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr.zip/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr/reports/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr.xhtml 8323
